{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-882 |revision=A1 (US) |series=AC2600 |asin=B0711TPTZL |newegg=N82E16833127600 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SGE (T&W) |manuf_model=AP-MTKH7 |manuf_rev=-0002 REV1.0 |price=160 |fcc_date=04/10/2017 |fcc_id=KA2IR882A1 |ic_id=4216A-IR882A1 |pcb_id=AP-MTKH7 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT;MEDIATEK, MT7621AT, 1751-AMTH, CTPH0Y93, DTPGXM46; |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12805D |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC64M16GP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7615N;MEDIATEK, ARM, MT7615N, 1634-BFSL, ACMSWLQL; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7615N;MEDIATEK, ARM, MT7615N, 1634-BFSL, ACMSWLQL; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |addl_chips=5GHz RF FEM;Qorvo (RFMD);RFFM4552;Q, 4552, 39PF;4; |flags=MU-MIMO, 256QAM, |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink 5.0.0.0;, |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, OpenWrt, |default_ssid=dlink-XXXX, |default_user=Admin |oui=18:0F:76 |oui_eth=18:0F:76 }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''800''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC2600 MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://us.dlink.com/en/products/dir-882-d-link-exo-wifi-router-ac2600-mu-mimo}} {{SupportPage|vendor=D-Link|model=DIR-882-US}} "AP-MTKH7-0002 REV1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/KA2IR882A1/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photo-3348918 FCC photos]. :P/N:BIR882LNA…A1, H/W Ver.:A1, F/W Ver.: XXXXXX ([https://fccid.io/KA2IR882A1/Label/Label-Sample-and-Location-Information-3348917 FCC Label]) The hardware appears to be identical to the [[D-Link DIR-878 rev A1]] :(aside from the USB ports) *Web GUI: http://dlinkrouter.local ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33144-d-link-dir-882-ac2600-mu-mimo-wi-fi-router-reviewed ''D-Link DIR-882 AC2600 MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://www.eteknix.com/d-link-exo-ac2600-dir-882-enthusiast-router-review/3/ ''D-Link Exo AC2600 (DIR-882) Enthusiast Router '' on '''Eteknix'''] ===See also=== *[[Motorola MR2600]] (identical internals) ==Images== *[http://imgur.com/a/rF6a4 Picture of PCB and serial pinout] __NOTOC__
